titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to specify what credit is given for certain subcontractors and to provide a dispute process for non-payment to subcontractors, and for other purposes.
Incentivizing Fairness in Subcontracting Act
Incentivizing Fairness in Subcontracting Act
Incentivizing Fairness in Subcontracting Act
Incentivizing Fairness in Subcontracting Act
Incentivizing Fairness in Subcontracting Act
Incentivizing Fairness in Subcontracting Act
Incentivizing Fairness in Subcontracting Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 115-942.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 733.

action.text: Mr. Chabot moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 6367.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
